model.figure

Class FigureHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.figure.FigureHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFigureHolder

    public class FigureHolder
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFigureHolder
    This class hold all figure for each player. So that it is not needed to create always new figure.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Figure[][] figures
      All figure which was moved for all player.
      private Figure[][] figuresUnmoved
      All figure which was not moved for all player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FigureHolder()
      Create a figure holder which hold for all player for each figure type a moved figure and a unmoved.
